attributes.comment:
I want to express my opinion about this increase on USCIS fees, first of all, they
have been making same thing several times by now and people that are been use
their services are waiting same or longer time, for their cases, so, increasing the
fees doesn't guarantee that they provide a better or faster service for their users,
secondly it is plainly unfair for thousands of families that are trying to bring their
relatives, let say, sons, dauthters, husbands, etc, and they are already strugling
with their finances, here we are talking about hard working families, that simply
can't afford an NEW INCREASE just like the one that is being proposed, so, that's
why I want to encourage to USCIS officials to work hand by hand with
congressional leaders to find an alternative permanent solution to keep up your
operations and not to harm mostly our hard working families. Thank you.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Jose M. Gonzalez
